note.p: Birth: Spencer House, St James's, London, England (30 May 1782)
Career: Ejected in December 1831 for non-payment of subscription (LB 425/43)
Ejected from the Society in December 1831 for non-payment of subscriptions
References: Malcolm Brown, 'How Not to "Regain Paradise": Henry Bellenden Ker, FRS from 1819 to 1831' in NR 1996 vol 50 pp 211-21
Notes: Elected a Fellow before becoming Earl Spencer.
